typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 3)) ~> source1
source1 sort(asc(movie, true),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 3)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'movies[n]',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Rating
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
